com.giift.sdk.ui.adapter

Class CursorRecyclerViewAdapter<VH extends RecyclerView.ViewHolder>

  • java.lang.Object
    • <any>
      • com.giift.sdk.ui.adapter.CursorRecyclerViewAdapter<VH>
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ConversionsAdapter, WalletRecyclerAdapter

    public abstract class CursorRecyclerViewAdapter<VH extends RecyclerView.ViewHolder>
extends <any>
    Created by giift on 23/1/17. This is an Adapter for RecyclerView which accepts a cursor

      • changeCursor

        public void changeCursor(android.database.Cursor cursor)
        Change the underlying cursor to a new cursor. If there is an existing cursor it will be closed.

      • swapCursor

        public android.database.Cursor swapCursor(android.database.Cursor newCursor)
        Swap in a new Cursor, returning the old Cursor. Unlike changeCursor(Cursor), the returned old Cursor is not closed.

        public void setDataValid(boolean mDataValid)
